title: Ocram's Razor
summaries: Ocram's Razor is a boss-summoning item used to summon Mechdusa. It can only be crafted in a Get fixed boi world with the Mechanical Eye, Mechanical Worm, and Mechanical Skull.
This item has no function when brought to other worlds, and its tooltip will display 'It has no effect in this world' instead.

result.value: [img:Ocram's Razor]Ocram's Razor
